mapper.update:
update mission_distribution
meeting=#{meeting},
task=#{task},
satrap=#{satrap},
executor=#{executor},
appointedTime=#{appointedTime},
createdTime=#{createdTime},
where missionId=#{missionId}

update mission_distribution set status=2, claimTime=getdate() where missionId in
${missionId}
mapper.select: WITH T AS( SELECT * FROM sys_users WHERE username=#{username} UNION ALL SELECT a.* FROM sys_users a INNER JOIN T ON a.parentId=T.id ) select count(*) from mission_distribution where status=1 and (satrap in(SELECT username FROM T) or executor in(SELECT username FROM T))

WITH T AS( SELECT * FROM sys_users WHERE username=#{username} UNION ALL SELECT a.* FROM sys_users a INNER JOIN T ON a.parentId=T.id )
select top ${pageSize} m.*,d.name department from mission_distribution m left join sys_users u on m.executor=u.username left join sys_depts d on d.id=u.deptId where status=1 and m.missionId not in (select top ${startIndex} missionId from mission_distribution where status=1 and (satrap in(SELECT username FROM T) or executor in(SELECT username FROM T))
ORDER BY createdTime desc) and (satrap in(SELECT username FROM T) or executor in(SELECT username FROM T)) order by m.createdTime desc

WITH T AS( SELECT * FROM sys_users WHERE username=#{username} UNION ALL SELECT a.* FROM sys_users a INNER JOIN T ON a.parentId=T.id )
select top ${pageSize} m.*,d.name department from mission_distribution m left join sys_users u on m.executor=u.username left join sys_depts d on d.id=u.deptId where status in(2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and m.missionId not in (select top ${startIndex} missionId from mission_distribution where status in(2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and (satrap in(SELECT username FROM T) or executor in(SELECT username FROM T))
ORDER BY status asc,createdTime desc) and (satrap in(SELECT username FROM T) or executor in(SELECT username FROM T)) order by m.status asc,m.createdTime desc
select * from mission_progress where disId=#{disId} order by createdTime asc

select * from mission_distribution where meeting=#{meeting} and executor!='' and executor is not null
and fixedTime between #{timeHead} and DATEADD(DAY,1,#{timeFoot})
